TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi DefaultSecureMimeContext extends MimeKit.Cryptography.SecureMimeContext

Docs.summary: A default implementation that uses a pkcs12 file as a certificate and private key store.

MemberSignature.Value: public DefaultSecureMimeContext ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Docs.exception: An error occurred while reading the backing pkcs12 file.

.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string rootCertificatesPath, string userCertificatesPath, string password) cil managed

Docs.param: The path to the root certificates.
The path to the pkcs12-formatted user certificates.
The password for the pkcs12 user certificates file.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Docs.exception: An error occurred while reading the file.

MemberSignature.Value: protected static readonly string DefaultRootCertificatesPath;
.field family static initonly string DefaultRootCertificatesPath

Docs.summary: The default root certificate store path.

remarks.para: On Microsoft Windows-based systems, this path will be something like C:\Users\UserName\AppData\Roaming\mimekit\root-certs.crt.
On Unix systems such as Linux and Mac OS X, this path will be ~/.mimekit/root-certs.crt.

MemberSignature.Value: protected static readonly string DefaultUserCertificatesPath;
.field family static initonly string DefaultUserCertificatesPath

Docs.summary: The default user certificate store path.

remarks.para: On Microsoft Windows-based systems, this path will be something like C:\Users\UserName\AppData\Roaming\mimekit\user-certs.p12.
On Unix systems such as Linux and Mac OS X, this path will be ~/.mimekit/user-certs.p12.
